gingangabada patha waliwitiya namathi sonduru sarabhumiye gewunu lamawiya pilibanda thorathuru, gothatuwa shripada chaithyaramaya nam aithihasika pin bime arahath dhajaya daramin ehi wadasiti therawarun padamulaye gewunu athithaya, parapuraka sihina apeksha dalwamin gewu disapamok diwiya, sasun ketha pohoni kala sarawath pawidi jiwithayaka asupiru than pilibandawa saha rata thota dana handina sathsamuduren eha lokaye hadaruwa winda jiwithayata ekathukaragath athdakim gana nawum thorathuru mehidi ma idiripath kala.pathawaliwitiya athulu gingangabada gam bimwala athitha parisarika pasubima, ehi gamiyange jiwitha saha iparani sirith wirith pilibanda rasaliptha thorathuru mehi athulath gothatuwa pansale aithihasika katha puwatha, ee ha bandunu baddegama pilibanda aprakata thorathuru, pasukaleka mulu ratema aagamika, samayika, sanskruthika saha adhyapanika prabodhayakata man heli kala ithihasagatha baddegama wadaye mularambhaya pilibanda lekhanagatha nowu thorathuru rashiyak hamuduruwan pawasuwa.me kruthiyata eewa siyallama athulath kala.
